description: Request parameters for updating an existing property list

base_properties.description: Complete replacement for the base properties list (not a patch). Each entry is a discriminated union: publisher_tags (publisher_domain + tags), publisher_ids (publisher_domain + property_ids), or identifiers (direct identifiers).

brand.description: Update brand reference. Resolved to full brand identity at execution time.

filters.description: Complete replacement for the filters (not a patch)

list_id.description: ID of the property list to update

webhook_url.description: Update the webhook URL for list change notifications (set to empty string to remove)

title: Update Property List Request
